channel.title: NISSI AUDIO – Google Product Feed
channel.description: Du lieu san pham thiet bi thu am chinh hang Nissi Audio

item.g:title: Neumann TLM 49 Studio Microphone – Micro thu am cao cap phong thu
item.g:description: Microphone Neumann TLM 49 la dong micro condenser cao cap cua Neumann, noi bat voi chat am am ap, trung thuc va giau nhac tinh, phu hop thu vocal, ballad, pop, acoustic va phong thu chuyen nghiep.
item.g:product_type: Microphone thu am phong thu cao cap
